title: Bots in my team?
body:
So I was playing a match of co-op and then...
My team kept disconnecting and then reconnecting
Then they started running towards mid and not helping with jungle
Suddenly, I realised their usernames were similar...
*twist plot*
https://gyazo.com/b12e37d9632f7221481246de13526ec1
All of their usernames had no caps and were completely random... I really wanted to leave the match.
Please do something about this...

replies.body: Even if you had two bots on your team, based on the picture the enemy team had 5 bots.
